ygData.subject: Re: Pet abilities
ygData.msgSnippet: Dark Empathy or whatever is was called was like a 30 point heal about level 20-30 I forget exact level but I know I used it at treeants back then. Naeeldar ...
ygData.messageBody:
Dark Empathy or whatever is was called was like a 30 point heal about level
20-30 I forget exact level but I know I used it at treeants back then.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Barry Senowitz <BarryS@...>
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com' <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, February 15, 2000 9:46 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Pet abilities


>From: Barry Senowitz <BarryS@...>
>
>We have always had a high level healing spell, now verant is putting more
of
>these types of spells in for the lower level nec's
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Naeeldar [mailto:jackal@...]
>Sent: Monday, February 14, 2000 5:39 PM
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Pet abilities
>
>
>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
>Eww I hate the thought of being a walking manastone. As for the healing
>spells they have always been there.
>
>Naeeldar
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Barry Senowitz <BarryS@...>
>To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com' <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Date: Monday, February 14, 2000 3:38 PM
>Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Pet abilities
>
>
>>From: Barry Senowitz <BarryS@...>
>>
>>We got hosed again (sigh). The only reason to give you pet weapons now 1)
>>at lower levels the weapon may have a better dmg than what your pet hits
>for
>>or 2) at 29th level and beyond, the only way to get your pet to double
>>attack is to give them 2 weapons (from what I have read to believe). Our
>>pets no longer get a reduced delay when handed weapons with an ATK less
>than
>>30.
>>
>>But let me tell you what, I can't wait for everyone to ask me to cast my
>>mana spells on them, or if I could cast my healing spells on them,
yipee!!!
>>Thanks verant for removing the manastone, I feel wanted again!!!
>>
>>Vanelin Blackheart
>>35th level (nerfed again) DE necro
>>
>>-----Original Message-----
>>From: Nat Russo [mailto:nrusso@...]
>>Sent: Monday, February 14, 2000 3:22 PM
>>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>>Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Pet abilities
>>
>>
>>From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
>>
>>Great site! Thanks for the link. I've just begun to peruse all of the
>>information they have there. I'm sure it will take me a while :)
>>
>>I do have another question (probably an ignorant one :( ) based on
>>information I'm reading at EQNecro. Some of the posts talk about "the
>>recent Delay nerf". What nerf is that? I'm operating on the assumption
>>that it's a good thing to give my pet a weapon with a delay of less than
>>30...regardless of the damage base. Is this true? Or has this so-called
>>"delay nerf" changed that?
>>
>>Thanks again,
>>Mujahid 15 Necro Sol Ro
>>
